text: John Otho Marsh Jr. (August 7, 1926 - February 4, 2019) was an American politician and a Professor at George Mason University School of Law.MARKLE He served as the United States Secretary of the Army from 1981 to 1989, and as United States House of Representatives from Virginia from 1963 to 1971.Richard Halloran, 'Washington Talk - Working Profile: Army Secretary John O. Marsh Jr.; Military Leader Wins High Ground, Quietly', in The New York Times, January 03, 1989 Marsh, Jr. died on February 4, 2019 from congestive heart failure in Raphine, Virginia, aged 92. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from congestive heart failure Category:Businesspeople from Virginia Category:Educators from Virginia Category:United States Secretaries of the Army Category:United States representatives from Virginia Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: John O. Marsh Jr.
